Wait while we are automatically authenticating your Number
OTP has been sent to you on your mobile phone. Please enter it below
We need this permission to read documents from device.

Location permission is needed for core functionality
Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.
Bhagalpur Administration welcomes you to Shravani mela 2024 celebrating from 22nd July. This app is dedicated towards pilgrims safe and comfortable journey to Baba Dham.

1. Always move in group 
2. Be sure to use torch and sticks during the night in the wild and mountainous pathways. 
3. Do not associate with strangers 
4. Protect your baggage security by your own. 
5. Female travelers are requested to stay in touch with their male hitchhikers in the night. 
6. In case of any sudden situation inform the local police station or the police in place of the place and cooperate with the police. 
7. Remember your mobile phone or home address 
8. All control room have police assistance center, use it. 
9. All control rooms have free mobile charging system, you can charge your mobile phones. 
10. Use the official Dharamsala or the Free Private Dharshala to stay. 
11. Send Kanwaria to the nearest Police Help Center who get lost. 
12. Do not go on rumor

1. Winner will receive a Certificate from
 Bhagalpur District Administration
 
 2. Only 1 entry is allowed per day per Person 
 other entries will be ignored 
 
3. Winner will be listed in Pic of the Day section 
 
4. All the selected Photos will be displayed 
 in the Gallery Section 
 
5. Photo must be relevant to Shravani Mela 
 
6. District Admin decision will be final

1. Kanwaria Bandhu do not go alone in the night. 
2. Do not eat any drug during travel. 
3. Female travelers are requested to not go alone in the night. 
4. Do not give your mobile number to any stranger 
5. Do not stay in a deserted and dark place. 
6. Do not pay more than the government rate on the food items. 
7. Do not accept any food given by an unknown person or Kanwaria. 
8. Do not give your mobile to any stranger to use.

श्रावणी मेला 2018 के लिए निम्नलिखित कामगारोंको दिनांक-27.07.2018 से दिनांक-27.08.2018 तक निम्नलिखित स्थलों पर अंकित समयानुसार अपने पूर्व के आवंटित कार्य एवं क्षेत्रों के अतिरिक्त कार्य करने का आदेश दिया जाता है। साथ ही इस अवधि में पड़नेवाले सभी साप्ताहिक अवकाश एवं सार्वजनिक अवकाश में भी सभी कामगार अपने कार्य पर उपस्थित रहेगें। सभी मानवबल विभागीय कामगार की देख-रेख में काम करेंगे।
कार्य क्षेत्र के ट्रांसफार्मर का नाम: चौक स्थित सभी ट्रांसफार्मर पार्वती मील बाहर भीतर दोनों, पीएचडी, स्टेशन, मालगोदाम, थाना के पास एवं ब्लॉक तक सभी ट्रांसफर्मर, लालकोठी
कार्य क्षेत्र के ट्रांसफार्मर का नाम: घाटरोड़, मोदीटोला,गोपाल गेट रोड़, अंदर एवं वाहर डोमासी गली काली स्थान, सीढ़ी घाट, बगीचा के सभी ट्रांसफार्मर
मुखयालय (फ्यूजकॉल सेंटर): नई सीढी घाट विद्युत नियंत्रण कक्ष 7033095829
कार्य क्षेत्र के ट्रांसफार्मर का नाम: टी०पी० चौधरी,पुरानी दुर्गास्थान, चित्रा सिनेमा,जे०पी० पार्क, पेट्रोल पम्प, आदर्शनगर,सीतारामपुर, शिवनन्दनपुर ,नयी दुर्गास्थान एवं मसदी के सभी ट्रांसफार्मर।
मुखयालय (फ्यूजकॉल सेंटर): विद्युतनियंत्रण कक्ष, जेपीपार्क, सुलतानगंज 7033095829
आपातकालीन फ्यूज कॉल गैंगः- 24 घंटे कार्यरत रहेंगे।
उपरोक्त सभी कामगार अपने कनीय विद्युत अभियंता सुलतानगंज (शहरी) तथा कनीय विद्युत अभियन्ता (ग्रामीण) के साथ कार्य पर तैनात रहेंगे।
अपनी पसंदीदा भाषा का चयन करें
1. Use this feature only in case of emergency \n2. Register mobile number before you ask for emergency help.
All the features will be activated by 15th July including Ganga Aarti.
Muzaffarpur Adminstration welcomes you to the prestigious Shravani Mela in the auspicious month of sawan 2022.

Fly to Patna Airport (Jay Prakash Narayan International Airport):

Location: Patna, Bihar
IATA Code: PAT
Distance to Sultanganj: Approximately 200 km (124 miles)
Fly to Bagdogra Airport:

Location: Bagdogra, West Bengal
IATA Code: IXB
Distance to Sultanganj: Approximately 300 km (186 miles)
Fly to Gaya Airport:

Location: Gaya, Bihar
IATA Code: GAY
Distance to Sultanganj: Approximately 250 km (155 miles)
From the Airport to Sultanganj:

By Taxi or Private Car: You can hire a taxi or book a private car from the airport to Sultanganj. This is the most convenient and direct option.
By Train: From Patna, you can take a train to Sultanganj. The Patna Junction railway station has frequent trains to Sultanganj.
By Bus: You can also take a bus from Patna to Sultanganj. Buses are available from the Patna bus stand to Bhagalpur, and from there, you can take a local bus or taxi to Sultanganj.
